titleInfo.title: Council of Jewish Junior Dress Up Party

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Dress up party of Junior Council about 1925, courtesy of Mrs. William Stein (Council of Jewish Juniors), #433.'' Typed on paper on back of photograph: ''Dress Up Party of Junior Council c 1930's donor - Mrs. William Stein; Row 1, 1. Rose Brown, 2. Faye Tuker, 3. Bev F. Wagner, 4. Lillian L Burke; Row 2, 1. Naomi Hellerstein, 2. [illegible], 3., 4. Rose Siegel, 5. Mary Jacobs, 6. Pauline Quiat, 7. Goldie Nathenson, 8., 9. Lil Rosenthal; Row 3, 1. Julie Ackeman, 2. Jeani Wiseman, 3., 4., Agnes Grosby, 5. Lillian Cohen, 6. Rita Heller, 7. Billie Stein, 8., 9. Vera Rothchild, 10., 11. Bertha Kerstein, 12.; Row 4, 1., 2., 3., 4., 5., Florence Spitzer, 6., 7. Irene Miller, 8. Zelma Perlou, 9., 10., 11. Rose [illegible], 12. Minnie [illegible].'' Handwritten on front of photograph: ''Grant Studio 1542 Glenarm.''

mods.abstract: A large group of young women, members of the Council of Jewish Juniors, at a dress up party. Some of the women are dressed as men. Some of the women are identified as Rose Brown, Faye Zuker, Bev F. Wagner, Lillian L Burke, Naomi Hellerstein, Rose Siegel, Mary Jacobs, Pauline Quiat, Goldie Nathenson, Lil Rosenthal, Julie Ackeman, Jeani Wiseman, Agnes Grosby, Lillian Cohen, Rita Heller, Billie Stein, Vera Rothchild, Bertha Kerstein, Florence Spitzer, Irene Miller, and Zelma Perlou.

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section
